name: Elizabeth's Book Notes Formula
description: How to take notes like me, based on this video here, as a Notion Template.

enhancedContent.overview:
Learn the proven note-taking system of Elizabeth Filips, a medical student and content creator known for her exceptional learning techniques and knowledge retention strategies. This free Notion template captures the exact methodology Elizabeth demonstrates in her popular YouTube video, giving you a ready-made framework for taking book notes that stick. Rather than passively highlighting or creating notes you'll never review, this formula helps you actively engage with material and build a genuine second brain of insights.

The template implements a specific structure designed to maximize comprehension and long-term retention when reading non-fiction books. Elizabeth's method isn't about capturing every detailâ€”it's about distilling key concepts, making connections to your existing knowledge, and creating actionable takeaways you can actually apply. This approach transforms reading from passive consumption into active learning, ensuring that the time you invest in books actually translates to knowledge you can use.

What makes this template valuable despite its simplicity is that it's based on proven cognitive science principles and battle-tested by someone who needs exceptional learning efficiency. Medical students can't afford to read books and forget themâ€”they need retention systems that work. By following Elizabeth's formula, you adopt a framework used by someone who's mastered the art of learning effectively, getting all the benefits of her experience without having to develop the system yourself.

faqs.question: Is this template compatible with the free version of Notion?
faqs.answer: Yes, this template works perfectly with Notion's free plan. You can duplicate it to your workspace and start taking book notes using Elizabeth's formula immediately without any paid features required.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! While the template provides Elizabeth's core formula, you can adapt it to your personal learning style. Add custom sections for specific types of books, modify prompts to match your reading goals, or expand sections that are most valuable for your learning process.

faqs.question: Do I need any special Notion knowledge to use this?
faqs.answer: Not at all. This template is designed for beginner-level users with a simple, straightforward structure. If you can type and navigate Notion pages, you can use Elizabeth's note-taking formula effectively. The template is intentionally uncomplicated to keep focus on the content, not the tool.

faqs.question: Will I receive updates to this template?
faqs.answer: Check with creator Elizabeth Filips regarding any update plans. As a free template demonstrating her video methodology, it captures the core formula which is already proven and effective. You can always re-duplicate if any updated versions are released.
